subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Conceding that his bid to buy the financially troubled team is “not going to look smart for a long time,” Matthew Hulsizer won unanimous approval from a committee of the N.H.L. board of governors.
snippet: Conceding that his bid to buy the financially troubled team is “not going to look smart for a long time,” Matthew Hulsizer won unanimous approval from a committee of the N.H.L. board of governors.
